body.name: Dash Cam Front and Rear,4K Full UHD 3 Channel Dash Camera for Cars, Dashcam with Night Vision with Free 32GB SD Card,Built-in WDR,G-Sensor,Loop Recording
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 1 hr 33 mins
features: 【4K Front and Rear Dash Cam】Can achieve the recording of ultra HD 4K(3840x2160). To reduce blind spots, it has a front wide Angle of 170 degrees and a back wide Angle of 120 degrees; And having super night vision technology (6 glass lenses + F1.8 aperture) helps to get relatively sharper lenses and images in low light conditions.Perfect dashcam for cars, truck, SUV,Bus, easier to provide evidence when insurance claim.

【Dash Camera for Cars 】Comes with a free U3 32GB Micro-SD memory card (supports up to 64GB). When the storage capacity on the memory card reaches its limit, the newly recorded recording will automatically overwrite the old recording. Triggered by the g sensor, it can automatically detect sudden vibrations/collisions and lock the lens to prevent video from being overwritten, even during loop recording.

【Dash Cam】The dashcam with super night vision and infrared cabin light uses f/2.0 wide aperture with a total of 6 layers of optical lens and WDR technology, coupled with 4 infrared lights, enabling the car camera to show good color accuracy and clearly capture important details day or night.

【Dash Camera】24-hour parking mode, the dashcam will automatically switch to parking mode when you stop and turn off. It can record continuously for 24 hours in parking mode, and has time-delay recording function to record continuously with low power consumption and low frame rate, providing all-weather protection for your car. (Please note: this product does not have it, so you will need to purchase a hardware kit to enable it)Vidgist.

【Dash Cam Front and Rear】The front camera can be easily installed anywhere on the windshield and connected to a power source, while the rear camera is simple to install and can be used by connecting to the front lens without removing the reverse headlight. The dashcam will automatically start recording when the car starts.

【Dash Cam】The three-channel camera can record video up to UHD 4K on the front and 1080P on the rear, Offering a 170° front camera, a 120° built-in camera and a 120° rear camera, it can simultaneously monitor the front, rear and interior of the vehicle to maximize road coverage, greatly enhance night vision and provide clear and crisp images and videos. The dashcam is a combination of front, rear and interior cameras.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 24H Parking Recording 2 Super Capacitor 3 Multi-Function
Previous page Next page 1 Loop Recording 2 Multi-Angle View

Does the g sensor feature lock the crash video in time when in parking mode? When the dashcam detects a car being hit or involved in a collision, it automatically locks on to the recorded video. (A separate hardware kit is required) 32gb memory card, how many days can we record? A 32GB SD card can record about 16 hours of video. Of course, the dashcam has a loop recording function. The new video overwrites the old one. Is the video of the car camera clear enough? This upgraded dashcam records very clear video, and it is small and easy to install! In what cold and hot weather can the dashcam be used? Will there be any damage? Dashcams use supercapacitors, which, unlike batteries, pose no danger of overheating or exploding. The operating temperature of the recorder is -4°F and 155°F, at which the recorder can work normally. Are the three dashcam cameras working at the same time? How does the rear camera record? This dashcam has two screens that work on the screen at the same time. If you don't install a rear camera, it will only record two front and interior views.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The rear one is hard to use because of wiring but over all its ok but not for long though

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. My first impression when I opened it I knew I was going to return it due to the fact of the charging setting it up was kind of easy but again very outdated charging takes forever I had it charging for over an hour and it was still flashing red to know where we unplug it or turn the car off it turns off save your money keep looking I'm going with the King slim D6 or D5 great camera A friend of mine has it and I was trying to save money but for the extra 30 or $60 it's well worth the money it has GPS and everything on it do not buy this camera save your money by the king Slim

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This product does met what’s said on description. Just a piece of junk. I spent over 1/2 day took cover off run cables found out quality videos just blurry and horrible picture color like back in the 60’s movie definitely not 4k quality. Web description said front cam 4k, cabin cam 1080p and backup cam 1080p BUT actually when I downloaded videos front cam 1080p, cabin cam 640p and backup cam 720p very frustrating me, plus buttons on camera very hard to press. Also videos show front cam recorded full screen but cabin & back cameras recorded split screen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Product is so outdated it's unreal would not work with my car in any fashion.
